Package sg.dex.starfish

Interface Asset

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bundle, DataAsset, Operation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AAsset, AMemoryAsset, AMemoryOperation, ARemoteAsset, FileAsset, MemoryAsset, MemoryBundle, RemoteBundle, RemoteDataAsset, RemoteOperation, ResourceAsset, SquidAsset, URIAsset
    public interface Asset
    Interface representing an Asset. An Asset in Starfish is an entity in the decentralised data ecosystem that is: A) Described by metadata B) Able to be used in Digital Supply Lines
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Mike

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getAssetID()
      Gets the ID for this Asset.
      default byte[] getContent()
      Gets the contents of this data asset as a byte[] array.
      default InputStream getContentStream()
      Gets the contents of this data asset as a input stream.
      DID getDID()
      Gets the DID for this asset.
      Map<String,​Object> getMetadata()
      Gets a copy of the JSON metadata for this asset, as a map of strings to values.
      String getMetadataString()
      Returns the metadata for this asset as a String.
      Map<String,​Object> getParamValue()
      Gets the representation of this asset as required to pass to a remote invokable service.
      default boolean isBundle()
      Tests if this asset is an bundle, i.e.
      default boolean isDataAsset()
      Returns true if this asset is a data asset, i.e.
      default boolean isOperation()
      Returns true if this asset is an operation, i.e.

    • Method Detail

      • getAssetID

        String getAssetID()
        Gets the ID for this Asset.

        The format of the asset ID is determined by the implementation.

        Returns:
        the assetID
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if unable to obtain ID

      • getDID

        DID getDID()
        Gets the DID for this asset. The DID may include a DID path to specify the precise asset if the DID refers to an agent managing the asset. Throws an exception if a DID is not available or cannot be constructed.
        Returns:
        The global DID for this asset.
        See Also:
        W3C DID spec

      • getMetadata

        Map<String,​Object> getMetadata()
        Gets a copy of the JSON metadata for this asset, as a map of strings to values.

        Asset metadata will differ as per type of asset: (e.g. dataset, operation, bundle)

        Returns:
        New clone of the parsed JSON metadata for this asset

      • isDataAsset

        default boolean isDataAsset()
        Returns true if this asset is a data asset, i.e. the asset represents an immutable data object.
        Returns:
        true if the asset is a data asset, false otherwise

      • isOperation

        default boolean isOperation()
        Returns true if this asset is an operation, i.e. can be invoked on an appropriate agent
        Returns:
        true if this asset is an operation, false otherwise

      • getMetadataString

        String getMetadataString()
        Returns the metadata for this asset as a String. Assets should store their metadata by default as a valid JSON string.

        Warning: Some implementations may not validate the JSON on asset creation and it is possible for the metadata String to contain invalid JSON.

        Returns:
        The metadata of this asset as a String

      • getContent

        default byte[] getContent()
        Gets the contents of this data asset as a byte[] array.
        Returns:
        The byte contents of this asset.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this asset does not support getting byte data
        AuthorizationException - if requester does not have access permission
        StorageException - if unable to load the Asset

      • getContentStream

        default InputStream getContentStream()
        Gets the contents of this data asset as a input stream.
        Returns:
        The byte contents of this asset.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this asset does not support getting byte data
        AuthorizationException - if requester does not have access permission
        StorageException - if unable to load the Asset

      • getParamValue

        Map<String,​Object> getParamValue()
        Gets the representation of this asset as required to pass to a remote invokable service.
        Returns:
        A map representing this asset

      • isBundle

        default boolean isBundle()
        Tests if this asset is an bundle, i.e. can contain sub-assets.
        Returns:
        true if this asset is an bundle, false otherwise
